metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19925 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
zipfileUpdate in ext/misc/zipfile.c in SQLite 3.30.1 mishandles a NULL pathname during an update of a ZIP archive.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19925` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.3
libsqlite3-0 - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.3
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.3
sqlite3 - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.22.0-1ubuntu0.3').
